resources.string: This Composable saves a count value in a State object that it owns directly by means of the \'remember\' function. The count value does not survive activity or process recreation.
This Composable saves a count value in a State object that it owns directly by means of the \'rememberSaveable\' function. The count value survives activity recreation and process recreation.

This Composable saves a count value in a State that belongs to its ViewModel. The ViewModel does not propagate the count value through to a SavedStateHandle object. The count value in this ViewModel survives activity recreation but not process recreation.

This Composable saves a count value in a State object that belongs to its ViewModel. The ViewModel propagates the count value through to a SavedStateHandle object. The count value in this ViewModel survives activity recreation and process recreation.

This Composable saves a count value in a LiveData object that belongs to its ViewModel\'s SavedStateHandle object. The count value in this ViewModel survives activity recreation and process recreation.

This Composable saves a count value in a StateFlow object that belongs to its ViewModel\'s SavedStateHandle object. The count value in this ViewModel survives activity recreation and process recreation.
